title: Soft dinner rolls
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon caster sugar', '4 tablespoons warm water (40 degrees C)', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '25g instant mash', '125g wholemeal flour', '250g plain flour', '250ml warm buttermilk (no more than 45 degrees C)', '50g butter, softened', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil or as needed', '2 tablespoons melted butter or as needed, divided']
